title: Use Snowflake troubleshooting tools | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Snowflake provides the following tools to test client connectivity by simplifying tests for a client’s ability to access Snowflake URLs:

Use the connector’s diagnostic feature for comprehensive testing. For more information and detailed steps,
see Running connectivity tests and diagnostics.
You can use SnowCD to diagnose connectivity for all Snowflake-related URLs. See the SnowCD User Guide for installation and usage instructions.
If you cannot use or install these tools in your system, you can follow the alternate steps, based on your platform.
If you successfully verified connectivity, proceed to follow-up actions.
